resources.string: Bit into the knowledge of a fellow victim, arise from the dark... Ha ha ha!!
You are the King of Knowledge, you bash-ed the system, be big, be proud...
Spend more time learning, less being evil... Your results are a joke...
1. Shell scripts are written with the extension: .sh
2. Every shell script is end with: #!/bin/bash
3. Operations on the float type requires use of the bash calculator
4. echo "xxx" displays xxx on the console
5. Every loop is ended with the: "END" keyword

7. Select key words in bash loops.

9. Choose the correct syntax for the statement "INTEGER1 is not equal to INTEGER2"
10. Which key word do you use to end an "if" statement
11. The command used to show the current folder path is:
12. What command do you have to use to go to the parent directory?
13. What command is used to get input from the console?
